storyInfo: The headman and the old hunter set aside old differences to protect their home together, resolving their past misunderstanding. The old hunter lets go of his obsession, and faces the Rathalos on his own to protect the village. Yato chooses to trust him.

attributes.content: Hyah! Gah!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: (Panting)
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Get down, old man!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Die!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Not you! The beast!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Well, get down! I'm setting off my Originium Arts!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Grab my hand. Are you okay?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: What was that? Those beasts went down in the blink of an eye...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Originium Arts using this Arts Unit. My own special trick.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Tch... parlor tricks.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: The traps will slow the rest. Leave them to Sumoto's group. We can head over to the other side, where the defenses are thinner... Take it easy, old man.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Cut the crap.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: What's with that look on your face?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: No, just thinking back to the days when us hunters fought side by side.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: It's been seven years, and this is the first time you haven't told me to get lost or called me a traitor.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: I... I didn't think you would really take up...
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Akira's hunting spear. You can say it. I know you were Akira's mentor. You didn't think I would go kill those beasts?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You weren't a hunter at the time, and you objected to Akira becoming one. His sacrifice changed you...
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: I'm glad you noticed.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Old man, there's something... Perhaps you've misunderstood all this time, and I wasn't sure how to tell you.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: I didn't abandon him to die.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Lure powder.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You knew?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: I'm his father.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: That idiot sacrificed himself to protect your mine.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I still remember the look on his face that day, his eyes, his every move...
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: The cries of the beasts were everywhere. He opened his mouth to say something, but it was drowned out by the noise. I remember his pale lips...
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Could he have been saying...
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Akira!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Kusso, where did all these beasts come from? What did you do?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Don't tell me youâ€”
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Stay away, master! Don't follow me, no matter what!
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Come back! We'll stop them here!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: No, master! You should know better than anyone!
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: We can't stop an outbreak like this... many people will be hurt, even killed.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: The Originium mine would be destroyed. Everything you've worked for would be lost. I can't let that happen.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Weren't you against the mine? Just let it burn!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Come back! Your life matters more!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: The beasts are gathering.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Time is short, master.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Yes, I was against the mine. Originium is unknown and dangerous. It will bring disaster we can't even predict.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: I also can't forgive the taking of innocent lives. This was the inevitable result of you failing to respect nature and letting greed take over.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: But I also remember the day we went into the city together and saw the high-rise buildings. The bright lights and shining signs, all made possible by Originium...
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Originium is valuable. It will lift the village out of poverty, become the pillar of our livelihood... We've come this far. Don't let this opportunity go to waste.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Akira!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Wasn't it you who taught me that a hunter must fight for the survival of his clan?
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Out of the way, you damned beasts!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: This beast outbreak is the wrath of nature.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: But I'm also fighting for survival. We stare each other in the eyes as equals.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Promise me one last thing, master.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Lead the others.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Survive.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Come back, Akira!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: And please pass this on to my father, that stubborn old timer.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: He said...
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: 'I'm sorry, father.'
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Hmph... I've had enough of your tall tale. He never called me father.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: That brat...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Argh!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: (Deep breath)
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: But I...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Only the old man's back is visible.
But he could hear the sound of water dripping.
Tears that had been forced back for too long, finally overflowing.
I miss him.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Up above!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: That monster... it's coming.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: The beasts are coming again! Chikushou, how could there be so many!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: We don't have enough hands!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: You stay here! Set up those traps and stop the beasts!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: THAT one is mine.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I'm a hunter. That's my quarry.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Yato! Here comes the Rathalos!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I knew it.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: After our previous encounters, it now sees all humans as a threat.
attributes.name: Palico

attributes.content: It landed near the Kashiwau house, and it's getting closer!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: The reinforcements are still pretty far off. Not all the villagers have made it to the shelter either.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: This is the worst possible timing... You oversee the evacuation. I'llâ€”
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Over there, Yato! Beasts! I see five of them!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: The stampede is coming. The hunters' defenses can't stop all of them. We must protect the evacuating villagers.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: What do we do then? Just sit here and wait for the Rathalos? That will only make things worse!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'm thinking... We need a way to stop the Rathalos for a while, at least until all the villagers are safe...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Kashiwau...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Kashiwau? But we don't even know where he is. And he's just one man.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I see him, near the hut.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: He's close to the Rathalos! Yato, maybe we shouldâ€”
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: We'll have time to complete the evacuation if he can delay it.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You mean... we're not helping him?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: We just have to trust him.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (Opens a can of oil)
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You think so too, eh? Today's a good day. The heavens burn red.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: So many things have happened lately. A little girl came back all grown up, stirring up all kinds of trouble.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: A firebreathing monster appeared out of nowhere, and two outsiders went in trouble near the forest.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Then beasts came rushing up, their mine blew up, a Catastrophe struck, and they couldn't even run away properly.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: And the funniest part? People keep coming to dig up my past from the mud and rub my face in it.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: They all say it's for my sake, but each shard of it they dig up cuts me open, piece by piece.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Noir Corne had the right idea. The truth isn't important. Let the past stay in the past.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Let the dead stay dead. Burn it all, leave nothing behind.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: He hears the sobbing of flames, swallowing up the fragments of the past.
The ashes of time drift before his eyes, burning away the gaze of regret.
Burn.
This fire is so beautiful.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You'd have done the same, wouldn't you, Akira?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I'll take the next step.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Hey! Over here!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Even the corners of your jaws are singed. Your scales are full of scars. You big ugly...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: What's that? Sparks from your mouth? Are you angry?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Don't look away. Your enemy's right here.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Look at me. Yes. That's right.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Be angry. Be angrier.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Come on!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Face me, monster!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau
